column5: What do you guys think about the strikemaster lazer mag express vs the mag 2000? Is it worth the extra couple $$$ to invest in the Lazer Mag express?  Thanks for any advice,  Nod
Save your money the Mag 2000 rocks.I have an 8" model and it eats ice. -Dan-
I also have the Mag 2000 8". Picked up a 10 inch blade for it last winter and it didn't slow down a bit - cuts through the ice like butter!  Don
